channel.title: Linux on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development

item.title: Build GCC 11 from source in Ubuntu
item.description: Here I am building the latest GCC, 11.1, in Ubuntu 21.04 from source. The procedure is exaplined step by step.

item.title: SSH port forwarding to download files
item.description: I want to download files from a destination computer connected to a public SSH server. The destination is accessible only via the server by SSH tunnel.

item.title: Handy cross-platform packages to connect to a remote Linux server
item.description: Interaction with a remote Linux server like transferring files, editing code, or accessing the remote desktop can be much easier with these free cross-platform packages.
